articles.title: Jazwell Brown: Man who murdered two women on Christmas Day after taking crack cocaine jailed for life
articles.description: Jazwell Brown, 49, attacked his partner, her dog and his teenage son, before targeting a neighbour and her boyfriend on 25 December 2024.
articles.content:
A man who murdered two women on Christmas Day has been jailed for life, with a minimum term of 39 years.
Jazwell Brown had previously pleaded guilty to killing Teohna Grant and Jo Pearson in Milton Keynes last year - as well as two counts of attempte... [3317 chars]

articles.title: What is Pakistan Army chief Asim Munir doing in the US?
articles.description: Pakistan Army chief Asim Munir is facing protests in the US, with a video showing demonstrators heckling and making scathing remarks against him.
